thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 9 of 657
thread.title: Connor Collins
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Connor Collins

author: Connor Collins
title: Connor Collins
text:
Terrible experience. My glasses won't stay on. First I contacted when a screw fell out to try to get a new one sent. I was told they would look into it and let me know. The next day I got an email with a RMA without explaination. I can't return the glasses because they are my only pair.
Eventually after contacting a couple more time, some new screws were sent. Wrong screws though!
I called again to try to get the right screw sent. I was told a week ago that the employee I talked to me would try and get back to me by the next day. I left her a message yesterday and have not heard back.
Terrible experience. My glasses won't stay on my face.
